Hunterdon County reports first case of coronavirus, health officials say
HUNTERDON COUNTY, N.J. - A 54-year-old woman in Hunterdon County has tested positive for the coronavirus, or COVID-19, the county health department said. The woman was treated at Hunterdon County Medical Center and is now recovering in isolation at home.
